amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being made available for the Wood Utilization (OR, MS, NC, MN, ME, MI, ID, TN, AK, WV) grant.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 110-290 to prohibit the use of funds for the Wood Utilization (OR,MS,NC,MN,ME,MI,ID,TN,AK,WV) grant.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 68 - 363 (Roll no. 813).
